vsParam:
Heehee... You guys, I got an idea of making money.
Would you like to hear it... Heehee.

Just ignore him. Ignore.
He's got no serious ideas as he seems so suspicious.

Hmm... I pretended to be a local in Ateria,
but still, it didn't work...

It took me pains to move to Ateria and
I even discovered a new lode... Hmm!

If it goes on like this... my family will fall apart!
Sorry, my wife and my children! I'm a useless father!

He changed his tone suddenly and said all those words
that will elicit your compassion!

Come on. Let's take care of it!
Sir... Can you tell me what happened?

Oh... Heehee.
You want to hear my story now?
Please speak as you normally do.

Ah, OK, sorry... Here is the thing.
I discovered a new lode... possibly.

Actually, I'd like to take a thorough investigation inside it,
but a giant rock blocks the passage and I couldn't move forward.

So I want to raise money to crack that rock.
But I got nothing and I'm now totally helpless.

I see... If so, [px].
Why don't you make a bomb for him with alchemy?

Yup. You can make a bomb with alchemy to smash the rock.
It should work. So... we'll help you, sir.

Oh, really!? You want to help me even though you barely know me?
Thank you so much...

You guys, I'm sorry but only you can help me
make the bomb...
